participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emma is focused on her goals and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and fashionable, Liam loves the finer things in life and isn't afraid to chase his dreams.
participant_2.background: i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family does not support my career choices.
